00013         template <class T>
00014         class KGE_API ResourceManager
00015         {
00016         public:

00019                 ResourceManager(core::Functor5<bool , Resource** , const u32 , const char*  , const char* , 
00020                         void* >*        CreateResourceFunction)
00021                 {
00022                         m_pCreateResourceFn = CreateResourceFunction;
00023 
00024                 } // Constructor
00025 
00027                 virtual ~ResourceManager()
00028                 {
00029                         // Searching for resource.
00030                         for(std::vector<T*>::iterator it = m_vResources.begin(); 
00031                                 it != m_vResources.end(); it++)
00032                         {
00033                                 if ((*it))
00034                                 {
00035                                         KGE_DELETE((*it), T);
00036                                         (*it) = NULL;
00037                                 }
00038                         }
00039 
00040                         m_vResources.clear();
00041 
00042                         if (m_pCreateResourceFn)
00043                         {
00044                                 delete m_pCreateResourceFn;
00045                                 m_pCreateResourceFn = NULL;
00046                         }
00047 
00048                 } // Destructor
00049 
00051                 virtual u32 Add(const char* FileName, void* ExtraParams, const char* Name)
00052                 {
00053                         // Searching for resource.
00054                         for(std::vector<T*>::iterator it = m_vResources.begin(); 
00055                                 it != m_vResources.end(); it++)
00056                         {
00057                                 if ((*it))
00058                                 {
00059                                         if ((*it)->GetFileName() && (*it)->GetName() && FileName && Name)
00060                                         {
00061                                                 if ( !strcmp((*it)->GetFileName(), FileName) && !strcmp((*it)->GetName(), Name) )
00062                                                 {
00063                                                         (*it)->AddRef();
00064                                                         return (*it)->GetHandle();
00065                                                 }
00066                                         }
00067                                         else if ((*it)->GetFileName() && FileName)
00068                                         {
00069                                                 if ( !strcmp((*it)->GetFileName(), FileName) )
00070                                                 {
00071                                                         (*it)->AddRef();
00072                                                         return (*it)->GetHandle();
00073                                                 }
00074                                         }
00075                                 }
00076                         }
00077 
00078                         // Resource not loaded yet.
00079                         T* pResource = NULL;
00080                         u32 handle;
00081                         bool Add;
00082                         if (m_sHandles.size() > 0)
00083                         {
00084                                 handle = m_sHandles.top();
00085                                 m_sHandles.pop();
00086                                 Add        = false;
00087                         }
00088                         else
00089                         {
00090                                 handle = (u32)m_vResources.size();
00091                                 Add    = true;
00092                         }
00093 
00094                         if (m_pCreateResourceFn)
00095                         {
00096                                 m_pCreateResourceFn->Call((Resource**)&pResource, handle, FileName, Name, ExtraParams);
00097                         }
00098                         else
00099                         {
00100                                 pResource = KGE_NEW(T)(handle, FileName, Name, NULL);
00101                         }
00102 
00103                         pResource->AddRef();
00104 
00105                         // Add it to array
00106                         if (Add)
00107                                 m_vResources.push_back(pResource);
00108                         else
00109                                 m_vResources[handle] = pResource;
00110 
00111                         return handle;
00112 
00113                 } // Add
00114 
00116                 virtual u32 Add(T* pResource)
00117                 {
00118                         u32 handle;
00119                         if (m_sHandles.size() > 0)
00120                         {
00121                                 handle = m_sHandles.top();
00122                                 m_sHandles.pop();
00123                         }
00124                         else
00125                                 handle = (u32)m_vResources.size();
00126                         ((Resource*)pResource)->m_iHandle = handle;
00127 
00128                         if (pResource->GetHandle() >= m_vResources.size())
00129                         {
00130                                 m_vResources.push_back(pResource);
00131                                 if (pResource->GetHandle() != m_vResources.size() - 1)
00132                                         pResource->m_iHandle = (u32)m_vResources.size() - 1;
00133                         }
00134                         else
00135                                 m_vResources[pResource->GetHandle()] = pResource;
00136 
00137                         return pResource->GetHandle();
00138 
00139                 } // AddManualResource
00140 
00141                 void RemoveResource(T* pResource)
00142                 {
00143                         m_sHandles.push(pResource->GetHandle());
00144                         m_vResources[pResource->GetHandle()] = NULL;
00145 
00146                 } // RemoveResource
00147 
00149                 virtual T* GetResource(u32 handle)
00150                 {
00151                         return m_vResources[handle];
00152 
00153                 } // GetResource
00154 
00155                 // returns resource handle before creating resource then use Add(Resource*, u32 Handel) function
00156                 // to set the loaded resource.
00157                 u32 GetNewHandle()
00158                 {
00159                         u32 handle;
00160                         if (m_sHandles.size() > 0)
00161                         {
00162                                 handle = m_sHandles.top();
00163                                 m_sHandles.pop();
00164                         }
00165                         else
00166                                 handle = (u32)m_vResources.size();
00167 
00168                         return handle;
00169 
00170                 } // GetNewHandle
00171 
00172         protected:
00173 
00174                 std::vector<T*>                 m_vResources;           
00175                 std::stack<u32>                 m_sHandles;                     
00176                 core::Functor5<bool , Resource** , const u32 , const char* , const char* , 
00177                         void* >*                        m_pCreateResourceFn;
